```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
SoilTemp <- read_excel("data/SoilTemp.xlsx") |> 
  mutate(Year = year(Date))

Truro <- SoilTemp |> filter(Site != "Montreal")

Montreal <- SoilTemp |> filter(Site == "Montreal")
```

# Montreal

```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_summary(data = Montreal |> filter(Model == "DNDC"), mapping = aes(Date, temp), geom = "line", col = "red") +
  stat_summary(data = Montreal |> filter(Model == "Obs"), mapping = aes(Date, temp), geom = "point") +
  facet_wrap(~Year, scales = "free") + theme_base()
```

# Truro

```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_summary(data = Truro |> filter(Model == "DNDC"), mapping = aes(Date, temp), geom = "line", col = "red") +
  stat_summary(data = Truro |> filter(Model == "Obs"), mapping = aes(Date, temp), geom = "point") +
  facet_wrap(~Year, scales = "free") +
  theme_base()
```
